Title: Directs the department of corrections and community supervision to test a program of supplying incarcerated individuals with tablets for educational and recreational means
Summary: Directs the department of corrections and community supervision to test a program of supplying incarcerated individuals with tablets for educational and recreational means.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the department of corrections and community supervision to test a program of supplying incarcerated individuals with tablets for educational and recreational means
